questions.description: An electromagnetic wave is propagating along Y-axis. Then -

options.description: Oscillating electric field is along X-axis and oscillating magnetic field is along Y-axis.
Oscillating electric field is along Z-axis and oscillating magnetic field is along X-axis.
Both oscillating electric and magnetic fields are along Y-axis, but phase difference between them is 90⁰.
Both oscillating electric and magnetic fields are mutually perpendicular in arbitrary directions.
